What's New

  • Boxes help you group, add structure, and guide collaborators around cards
  • Improved URL Preview Controls
  • Youtube URLs can be played directly in your space
  • Improved Android Support. From the beach to the boardroom, read and edit spaces on your android phone too

  • Inbox for collecting thoughts, todos, and ideas that don't have a place to go yet
